name: BetAI
description: BetAI is an AI-Driven Bets insight platform, aimed at the general public, with the purpose of serving as analytical help of matches on different sports. Our idea is pretty straightforward — You bet, our AI provides the likelihoods — of anything you want to know. This will help you make informed decisions, although remember, nothing ever given by an inanimate product is financial advice. The evaluations we provide should be used as a means of information, a needed data-source to not miss on any details, saving up both your time looking for stats — and thinking them through by yourself — since we do not only provide the data, but also our own assessment of it!
